_meta.description: Venue Reduced Record — 20 core fields for high-level filtering and bride-facing comparison.

short_description: A majestic 70-hectare wine estate in the heart of the Luberon Natural Reserve in Provence, featuring formal gardens, vineyards, 3 swimming pools, and accommodation for 32 guests across 15 bedrooms.
curfew: 11:30 PM outdoors (obligatory indoor dance party from 11:30 PM)
